SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, cert_number, serial_number, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, serial_number_id FROM elp_serial_number WHERE serial_number_id = :serial_number_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_serial_number SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, cert_number = :cert_number, serial_number = :serial_number, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE serial_number_id = :serial_number_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_serial_number ( dealer_id, cert_number, serial_number, created_by, serial_number_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :cert_number, :serial_number, :created_by, :serial_number_id )
